title: ivagEke parimaLa
sahitya:
ivagEke parimaLa ivagEke shrngAra navanIta cOra nAruva gollage


caraNam 1    holasu maiyavagEke hosa kastUri vATa taladOruvavagEke daTTa punugu 
balu kEshadavagEke bAvannadA lEpa salekurupinavagEka maNDesAdu
    caraNam 2    tulasi mAleya dharisidavage javvAji kolegaDukagEke kumkumada tilaka 
aletiuvagEke araNyada angada sukha aLiya ambuvage kananga sobagu
    caraNam 3    parasatiya bayasuvage pannaga shayanavEke haridADuvanigEke Ada pagaDi 
siridEvi shrngAra kaidu varisida baLika dharegadhikanAdani purandara viTTala
